Detailed Description

Common interface for a storage of files.

Definition at line 17 of file IFileSystemChangeStorage.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum ifpf::IFileSystemChangeStorage::ChangeFlags

File system change flags.

Enumerator:
CF_NEW  File(s) were added.
CF_REMOVED  File(s) were removed.
CF_MODIFIED  File(s) were modified.
CF_ATTRIBUTE_CHANGED  File's attributes were changed.
CF_SOME_CHANGES  All possible changes.

Reimplemented from istd::IChangeable.

virtual void ifpf::IFileSystemChangeStorage::UpdateStorageItem ( const istd::CString &  path,
int  itemFlags 
) [pure virtual]

Update storage item.

If the item not exists, new one will be created and added to the storage. If the item is marked as "removed" it will not deleted from the storage. Use RemoveItemStorage, if you want permanently remove the item from the storage.

Implemented in ifpf::CFileSystemChangeStorage.
